snippet: A highly classified court order disclosed on Wednesday night directs a Verizon Communications subsidiary to turn over call logs to the National Security Agency.
abstract: Highly classified court order shows that Obama administration is secretly carrying out domestic surveillance program under which it is collecting business communications records involving Americans under hotly debated section of Patriot Act; order directs Verizon Communications subsidiary to turn over call logs to National Security Agency.

byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and EDWARD WYATT

lead_paragraph: A highly classified court order disclosed on Wednesday night directs a Verizon Communications subsidiary to turn over call logs to the National Security Agency.

headline.main: U.S. Is Secretly Collecting Records of Verizon Calls
headline.print_headline: U.S. Secretly Collecting Logs of Business Calls
